statements: DELETE FROM users WHERE user_name = 'Alice' AND playlist_name = 'Favorites';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 AND user_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM users WHERE playlist_name = 'Workout' AND playlist_songs @> '{"genre": "Pop"}' AND user_id = 3;
DELETE FROM playlists WHERE playlist_name = 'My Playlist' AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe')
DELETE FROM songs WHERE song_title = 'In the End' AND artist_name = 'Linkin Park';
DELETE FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND duration > '00:03:30';
DELETE FROM Songs WHERE artist = 'John Doe';
